Labour leader Eamon Gilmore says Fine Gael's planned cuts will hit schools. The cuts that Fine Gael are proposing- the 30,000 reduction in the numbers of people who are employed by the public service- will impact on schools.`` It will mean taking teachers and special needs assistants out of schools, and the people who will lose as a result of that are children who will not get the support they need.
